com.informix.jdbc

Class IfxSmBlob

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.informix.jdbc.IfxObject
      • com.informix.jdbc.IfxSmBlob

  • public class IfxSmBlob
extends IfxObject
    Support for Clob/Blob datatypes. This class derived from IfxBaseType class.
    See Also:
    IfxBaseType

      IfxSmBlob() constructor will be called from setAsciiStream() method It takes two parameters.
